pullRequest.title: L1 Foliage
pullRequest.bodyText:
Implements Level 1 Foliage of TO p.36. I called them "low woods" and "low jungle"

Mechs or anything else that counts as being 2 levels high for LOS (e.g. VTOLs at elev 1) in or behind L1F receive no bonus (TO says Mechs never receive a partial cover bonus. Since a mech is a full level higher than the woods I suppose they don't receive any bonus from standing in it or standing behind it)
The Board Editor got two new buttons to place low woods and jungle.
The terrain is represented with a new terrain type called foliage_elev that gives the elevation of the woods with the allowed values of 1, 2 for L/H and 3 for U woods/jungles.
This new terrain is required but the board loader adds it with regular foliage height when it's not present
The boardview shows "LOW" in any hex with L1F. I think its difficult to represent this purely with gfx, and in any case I didnt have any new gfx. I created a separate image for the standard grass Saxarba light and heavy woods but no more (for now).

Notes:

Atmospheric map altitude of low foliage is 1 like with regular foliage
Adjusted the TFs of jungles to the values given in TO, 10 more than woods
Made woods and jungles in the same hex invalid
I'm not sure if special chainsaw attacks on woods are in MM. In any case, I didnt change anything in that direction.
Resolves #2212
Resolves #1719
